text:
This PR fixes some bugs in the dataset downloader:
- resuming in general (broken since python3 PR)
- resuming broken for some servers (those who don't comply with standard HTTP error)
- downloading of files with no name (they are named after a md5 hash of the URL)
title: Url opener
clean_text: thi PR fix bug dataset download resum gener broken sinc python3 PR resum broken server dont compli standard http error download file name name md5 hash url
